dataList.content: This is a component part taken from the structure that forms H Corp.
This may prove to be an opportunity to conduct an in-depth analysis on the nature of the former H Corp.'s Singularity, which has been enduring for such a long time.
Huh... You look kinda upbeat today, Miss Faust.
Indeed. An opportunity to study the old H Corp.'s Singularity is not one that comes often.
As there was potential for integration into Mephistopheles, I made a request to disassemble a part of the bus's engine... but was denied. A shame.
Uh... aren't you the one who built Mephistopheles though, Miss Faust?
Mephistopheles is indeed Faust's work, but not all of it was mine. It is possible that Faust may never reveal every small detail that went into its creation.
I would very much enjoy a chance to completely disassemble it, even its engines, so that it could be reassembled with my own hands.
